name: Pilotly, Inc.
description: Developer of a consumer insight research platform designed to create meaningful engagements between content creators and global audiences. The company's platform offers its customers a quality video viewing service and offers an insight dashboard, enabling content creators to make business decisions by getting real-time data and reports about customer preferences.
one_liner: Developer of a consumer insight research platform designed to create meaningful engagements between content creators and global audiences. The company's platform offers its customers a quality video viewing service and offers an insight dashboard, enabling content creators to make business decisions by getting real-time data and reports about customer preferences.
